Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a picture of a string telephone showing two students using it to talk to each other.
The student can show in the drawing how the string connects the two students' cups and stretches over a distance.
The student can illustrate the role of the string in carrying sound from one cup to the other.
The student can depict how the sound travels through the string, using lines or arrows to indicate sound waves.
The student can label the parts of the telephone (e.g., cup, string) in the drawing.
The student can explain through a caption or labels how people use such devices to communicate over distances.
